compression.comment: Enable/disable gzip compression on SOAP requests and responses.

compression_level.comment: The level of gzip compression to use, from 1 to 9. The higher the level the greater the compression and time needed to perform the compression. The recommended and default value is 1.

wsdl_cache.comment: The type of WSDL caching to use. The possible values are 0 (none), 1 (disk), 2 (memory), or 3 (disk and memory). The default value is 0.

verify_peer.comment: Enable/disable peer verification of SSL certificates. If enabled, specify either 'ca_path' or 'ca_file'.

ca_path.comment: The certificate authority directory to search in when performing peer validation. For example: /etc/ssl/certs

ca_file.commit: The certificate authority file to use when performing peer validation.

path_relative.comment: Log directory is either an absolute path, or relative path to the YDirectUser.php file.
